subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: In 1995, Blackburn won England’s top soccer league, one of the last times a team owned by an Englishman, fielding predominantly English talent, would do so. Now the team is at the bottom of the pile.
snippet: In 1995, Blackburn won England’s top soccer league, one of the last times a team owned by an Englishman, fielding predominantly English talent, would do so. Now the team is at the bottom of the pile.
